# Breakfast & Brunch {-}

## Egg-based {-}

### Dutch Baby {-}

*Ingredients*

* 3 eggs
* 1/2 cup flour
* 1/2 cup milk
* 1 TBSP sugar
* Pinch of nutmeg
* Pinch of salt
* Drop of vanilla
* 2 TBSP butter

*Instructions*

1. Combine the eggs, flour, milk, sugar, nutmeg, salt, and vanilla in a bowl. Whisk until combined. 
2. Melt the butter and pour into a 10 inch or so baking dish.
3. Pour batter into the baking dish.
4. Bake at 425 for 20 minutes or until it looks puffed up enough.
